text: Takozh (vykuplenyy) try khto zalyshyvsya zzadu. Prostora zemlya stala tak straitened dlya nykh, shcho vony mayzhe vidmovylysya vid vsʹoho spodivannya dlya sebe. Nareshti, vony zdiysnyly shcho tam ni vtecha z BOHA, krim yomu. Vin todi vykupyv yikh shcho vony mozhutʹ kayatysya. BOH yavlyaye soboyu Redeemer, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
